feed.title: Cypress Hills (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Cypress Hills (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cypress Hills Provincial Park 10:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: 2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: 1.0°C
Wind: SE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero except high plus 5 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or rain showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near zero except high plus 5 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
